website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option for JBL headphones.
pros: A comfortable option as far as in-ear headphones go
The cable is durable, and these feature a built-in microphone so you can transition from music to talking on the phone
Many customers found the sound quality to be excellent for such a tiny pair of headphones
cons: The volume control can be inconsistent, and these are on the quieter side

customer_reviews.title: JBL for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting older and I can't stand so lots of mid and highs. I'm finding JBL is more suited to my ear now than when I was younger. These do try to slide out occasionally. I used the largest rubber pad and the sound improved greatly. I mow with these on and they work good. Microphone seems to work well also. For the price I thought it was a good deal. I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Boy

customer_reviews.title: Price is right for the Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, they play like a pair of $100 dollar ear buds but cost 1/3. Buy them while you can. I have lost my last two pair by accident. I keep coming back to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: I love em
customer_reviews.text: I got these after they were discontinued for half as rice and say they are a nice pair for I think I paid 22 dollars. I hear people complaining about won't stay in your ears even tho it comes with multiple size plugs. I can use any size and it never matters for me. I think some people just love to complain or they paid full price and expected more or something witch I would understand but at this price scoop em up because they are worth it sound quality wise.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Allen

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought these new to use with my iPhone 10R and they haven't worked correctly for one day. If the chord moves even a little bit it will either pause, play, rewind or skip to a new song, podcast or video. It has also started calling contacts in my phone randomly when they are plugged in. When I'm walking I can't go more than two seconds with one of these issues happening. The headphone cable is way too thick making the cable heavy and the earbuds will fall out of constantly. Do not buy these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.. durable and good price
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with JBL..by Hardon Great quality and sound...very comfortable they used to retail for 40 when they came out... they are a very good value at 20. New model might be 10% better but it’s 30 more.. for listening to your phone and making calls they are great cables are very durable... bought one and now just bought another since I’m so pleased with themson (my son uses the first pair)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Areas

customer_reviews.title: Sound's ok, fit is bad
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is fine, and the microphone works well. However the buds fall out of my ear very easily, more so than any other pair of headphones I've ever used. Running is almost impossible, even walking isn't great. They're fine but I'd recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and plugged them into my iPhone. With some EQ adjustments in the phone these sound great. I am replacing a set of cheaper Sony buds ($15-20) with these JBL's and they sounds a little better. The bass is more than adequate, and the highs and lows are clear. Not much else to say, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F.

customer_reviews.title: Win win deal and great sound and bass that's not over powerful but just right!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great fits good if you change too your size and working out I would go wireless but JBL is always been good stuff since I was younger than a grasshopper so a must buy if you need a good sound and a great price so a win win....
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can put these in my pocket at work and won't have a problem of them coming out in a knot. I love that they are long and I can easily put my phone in my pocket and not worry about the plug disconnecting if I turn a certain way.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for someone and they love the build quality and sound. Two things that you need in an earphone, really. Don’t waste your money on expensive Apple product and get this awesome alternative.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds sound amazing, but rubber part too thin of material
customer_reviews.text: Wow, for the price these are a no brainer. I hear things in songs that I have never heard before. I sit in a cubical all day at work and even at low volume the sound is incredible. The one drawback is the rubber ear buds are too thin and sound escapes. I took the rubber off my old pair of Sony and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, Sound Quality is Meh....
customer_reviews.text: There is no way that these are a 4 Star pair of Earbuds, JBL is getting their moneys worth off these things. It must've cost them(JBL) less than $5 to make to be honest. I also think the "High-performance JBL drivers" was just words they threw on the listing to make it attractive. They must have made good use of the prevalent Fake Reviewers on Amazon to get it to the 4 Stars it is currently sitting at. I would however recommend these from JBL: "JBL TMG21BL Tim McGraw Artist Series Earbuds" instead. (They cost half the price of these.)
customer_reviews.author: paul rubio

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These are bottom of the drawer earbuds for emergency use only. No bass or mid bass, and worst of all, an artificial “plasticky” sound - not at all naturally musical. I find it hard to believe that anyone with minimally good hearing ability would rate these highly. Unlistenable. Not one of JBL’s better products. Skip it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ghitman

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort for long-term use.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 members of family that work on- linecand swear by this brand and model. Outdistanced competitors in comfort and quality!
customer_reviews.author: pnick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great earbuds for the price! nice features and sound is very good. So far a great purchase. Just bought a second pair and still very, very happy. Great customer service from 3rd party as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Less than stellar.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is subpar, and hurting for bass. They work, and will meet what I want out of them: which is just to play music while I'm sitting on the bus, but for a JBL product? Does not meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: not at all durable
customer_reviews.text: purchased this product on August 6th and have been taking great care of them since then. however, 6 weeks later after only using them during my train commute to and from work, the left headphone is damaged on the interior and gives that all-too-familiar sound of vibrations from the broken plastic inside. i had high hopes for these headphones but they let me down way too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wires!
customer_reviews.text: The wires are super brawny and not prone to breaking like thinner wires. While a bit heavier, it makes this a good choice for working out and exercising. i use them while solo mountain biking. (Never on the road!)
customer_reviews.author: History Nut

customer_reviews.title: They're Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: JBL has made better. These are on the affordable end for everyone to own. But they're okay for my work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, really lengthy and isolates most of the noise around you. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stase

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money even at a heavily reduced price.
customer_reviews.text: They fall out a lot when running. The cord material is a flat finish, so it grabs your clothing. The sound quality is average at best.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruegg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing earphones. I got this for 9.99USD. Really recommend those earphone. You won't regret it. And it has amazing bass and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and the sound is great. Rich base as well. I use them for working out and they're more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but need after market ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: Moderate sound quality with base, cord is extremely durable with moderate weight, but the ear plugs for the drivers are pretty bad. They have little padding, when you put the ear piece in, you feel the plastic digging in through the ear plugs. Changing the inbox ear plug sizes has no effect for this problem. Thus, it can be rather uncomfortable. I have not owned these for long enough to comment on build quality. I do recommend these ear phones IF you buy or use after market ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatius Varghese

customer_reviews.title: So pretty they called attention.
customer_reviews.text: They are cool. I could not use them much, because someone stole them. But I guess that it's because they look awesome. He he he.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gonzalez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: But the other model. This will suction your ear drums. Don’t buy it. Their other models are better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Great set of ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of ear buds indeed especially for the money I paid for them and they were name brand JBL's.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Knight

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: You won't find any other set of ear buds with this much quality for less than $25. Everything from the sound to the microphone works great.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it sound clear with the right amount of bass
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound and trouble is trying to get the left side to stay in while on the trademill
customer_reviews.author: Jalina Jay Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: IMPRESSIVE SOUND for the price of a regular pair of headphones!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan STARCENBAUM

customer_reviews.title: The Worst
customer_reviews.text: The cable is toooooooo long, U will be standing the cable will be touching your knees while the headphones are literally in your ears, the headphones themselves are so uncomfortable. Worst headphones ever.
customer_reviews.author: AbduAllah Rifai

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: I am actually disappointed.. poor quality. I think there are better quality headphones that are the same price out there..
customer_reviews.author: Fernandomontijo81

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was with the sizing of the buds. Medium was a bit small, while large was a bit big... but that's not the brand's fault. Amazing sound, love the material and such a great price

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, mic isn’t
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. The mic though doesn’t work properly. Whenever I’m on the phone wearing those headphones the other person can barely hear me, my voice is too low.
customer_reviews.author: Danielcm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Are prefect for everything you want to do, either if it's workout or just listening to some good music without being disturbed by outside noise. The sound quality it's amazing, you feel like being in a club.
customer_reviews.author: Constantin Sitaru

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sound great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and sound great for the money. Use them almost every day for hours. Even in the rain. I'm on my second set. I broke my last ones by accidentally cutting the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Don't get
customer_reviews.text: Did not stay in my ear, i tried all the different size ear pieces and none of them worked. I got some skull candy headphonrs that are way better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE how these stay in my ear and are comfortable. Good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Fit is not good enough. Even trying all the tip sizes. And the cables are too wide, heavy and sticky. The sound quality is good, but not good enough. Bought mine to replace my old AKG K321, but I'll keep using the old ones for a great while longer...
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Spínola C V L Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. Didn’t have to use attachments to fit ear. Sound quality is great.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value
customer_reviews.text: Not much base. I guess this is about as much sound as you can expect at this price point from in ear headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit surprised by these. They are awesome. Sound quality and functionality are off the charts... Thank you...

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, not as comfortable as they look despite changing pods.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Prado

customer_reviews.title: Great soind quality for the price, bad comfort
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great for the money, but comfort is worse than JBL's T-290. I had to borrow a pair of my T-290's silicon rubbers in order get better comfort from J-22a.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best earbuds for the price.. great bass. UPDATE: Stopped working after a few weeks out of no wear.

customer_reviews.title: These work great and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These work great and very sturdy. I go thru atleast a pair of ear buds a month. Even the Apple ones dont last long with me. But these have stood up to my abuse and are still like new.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Very good sound for very little money.
customer_reviews.text: Actually a great buy, rubber doesn't stay in my ears very well though even with the smallest ones. Sound quality is exceptional for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Best Performance for this Price
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth every penny, very good cost benefit

customer_reviews.title: Great buds
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of buds for the money, got to use with my ps4 and work great

customer_reviews.text: Bought many units for kids. This is an excellent, cost effective and durable headset.

customer_reviews.title: I love JBL

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good speakers, especially for the price. They fit well and have good sound quality (for me, a non-audiophile). I use them to bike with and they do a good job cutting out the wind noise. I'm happy with them, and would purchase them again.

customer_reviews.title: Even before I ran the JBL burn-in process they sounded wonderful. BUT this headset doesn't deliver much protection from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous sounding pair of ear-buds. Even before I ran the JBL burn-in process they sounded wonderful. BUT this headset doesn't deliver much protection from the sonic environment. I took them with on the subway down to the radio station yesterday and had to turn the sound way up and clutch the earbuds to my ears to deal with train traffic and announcements. SO — top marks for fidelity, but use them in a quiet environment for full enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McGlaughlin

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day, I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Trusal

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: These errands are extremely awesome I ordered four of them.
customer_reviews.author: GGutz

customer_reviews.title: Good balanced sound.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound really good, they don't focus on just bass but more on balance, so you may not like these if your a bass junkie. They come with nice leather pouch and three different sizes of buds the choose from. Build quality is typical JBL so they're gonna last so long as you don't abuse them by yanking the cord or something. I can compare these to my Sol Republic Jaxs. The Jaxs are lighter in weight and sound similar. These J22's sound very similar however you get more of everything in each song. More highs, mids and lows.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicEndurance80

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good but inexpensive earphones and these are a great buy. Good frequency response and fidelity. The only thing I'm adding to mine are Comply foam tips and that's just a personal preference over the silicone tips that come with these. I'm already thinking I'll buy an additional pair.
